categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Qort was a male Padawan in the Jedi Order during the High Republic Era, the best friend of fellow Padawans Lula Talisola and Farzala Tarabal. The trio studied on the Padawan Academic Cruiser Star Hopper, and in that capacity were dispatched to assist the planet Trymant IV after an Emergence. Qort had blue skin and brown eyes, and wore a mask of a lighter blue. Qort wielded a blue-bladed lightsaber.

Qort was a Force-sensitive male individual who was a Padawan in the Jedi Order during the High Republic Era. Qort's best friends were fellow apprentices Lula Talisola and Farzala Tarabal, and Talisola frequently looked out for Tarabal and Qort. Eventually, Qort became a member of a class of Padawans training aboard the Jedi cruiser Star Hopper under Grand Master Yoda and Jedi Master Torban Buck.

Qort was a member of a sentient species with deep blue skin and brown eyes. The Padawan was also quite short, although he was taller than the diminutive Master Yoda. Qort understood Galactic Basic Standard but did not speak it, communicating in an alien language. Qort was kindly, being quick to back up Lula Talisola's statement that she and her friends would support Zeen Mrala while the Mikkian girl was crying over being separated from her best friend.
Qort could use the Force, and was talented enough in lightsaber combat to battle pirates on Trymant IV.

Qort wore brown Jedi robes and wielded a blue-bladed lightsaber. The Jedi apprentice wore a light blue skull mask which covered almost all of Qort's head save for the eyes, mouth and chin. The mask had a texture of crown-like spikes radiating from it.

Qort debuted in the first issue of the comic book series Star Wars: The High Republic Adventures. Qort's mask bears a striking resemblance to Darth Krayt's vonduun crab armor helmet from the Legends comic book Star Wars: Legacy. In the Canon comic Doctor Aphra 35, set during the Imperial Era, a helmet very similar to Qort's is visible in the Gallery of Peace.
